ModMetaData.name: ContainerMortarMod
ModMetaData.description: Adding Container Mortar. It lunch Container that is contains some items and send to destination even flying over walls. Please place loading station by Container mortar and load items you want to lunch. "Mortar" researching is needed for construct Container mortar. Shock absorbe container is needed as ammunition for Container Mortar. It can make in Smith Workshop.
